please klick..........
 
_http://www.esnips.com/web/menuki_ (http://www.esnips.com/web/menuki) 
 
this is from a restoration project by Dr. Lewitte ( spelling ? )for a  
massive  naginata naoshi papered to Hoju ( early Muromachi ) by the  NBTHK.
The tsuka  has gold brocade ( instead of same ).
Dr. Lewitte has the brocade  and the saya cleaned up in Japan,  purchased a 
signed  shoami katana size tsuba, big Hizen style f/k and this  Ezo menuki to 
complete the restoration.
 
The  Ezo menuki is 7 cm. in length.
 
Above info are from private correspondence between the good Doctor and a  
good friend of mine who passed the deal to me..................
 
milt
